title: The Wizard Takes a Holiday
description: A much-loved wizard takes a vacation to rural, fantastical Indiana, where he finds getting away from his work is harder than he thinks.Re-released on 12/1/12.Now includes The Wizard Takes a Holiday by Red Tash, Application of the Scientific Method to Family Management by Ash Krafton, Southern Hospitality by Claudia Lefeve, and Lucian's First Trick by Red Tash.
author: Red Tash
